CustomField.description: This is the account associated with this lead. If it already exists, select it. If not, DO NOT create a new account. You will create the account when you win the Opportunity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the account associated with this lead. If it already exists, select it. If not, DO NOT create a new account. You will create the account when you win the Opportunity.
CustomField.label: Account
